This repository currently shows some of the contributions to the weekly TidyTuesday challenge. Each week my aim is to either grow my skills on a existing visualization type or to explorea new package I have come across. 

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(htmlwidgets)
library(slickR) #used to create sideshow
library(here) #help point to each image

```



```{r slideshow, echo=FALSE, fig.align='center'}

tidytuesday_plots <- tibble(
  dataset = c("gov_spending_kids",
              "nz_birds"),
  url = c(here("#TidyTuesday", "Australian Pets", "australian_pets.png"),
          here("#TidyTuesday", "NZ Bird of the Year", "NZ_Bird_of_Year.jpeg")))

slickR(obj = tidytuesday_plots$url) +
  settings(dots = TRUE, autoplay = TRUE,
           autoplaySpeed = 5000)

```
